description.value: A code from the SNOMED Clinical Terminology UK coding system which represent aspects of accommodation including type and tenure of accommodation. This vocab contains multiple distinct sub-sets of codes. Any code from the SNOMED CT UK 'AccommodationTenure' or 'AccommodationType' subset with subset original id 6171000000131 or 6161000000138; the corresponding SNOMED CT UK Refset fully specified name is 'Tenure of accommodation simple reference set (foundation metadata concept)' with Refset Id 999001361000000109 or 999001371000000102.

copyright.value: This value set includes content from SNOMED CT, which is copyright © 2002+ International Health Terminology Standards Development Organisation (IHTSDO), and distributed by agreement between IHTSDO and HL7. Implementer use of SNOMED CT is not covered by this agreement.
